name: Benjamin Boy
job: Web developer with appetency for front-end
aboutContent: From an original training in the graphic industry to a career change to become a web developer, passionate about music, fond of hiking and surfing, I seek to put my knowledge and my skills to good use.

Being experienced in graphic jobs, I am naturally committing myself to front-end development with the use of css, sass, tailwind, React and other frameworks and libraries on top of good knowledge of Javascript.
aboutHireMeContent: Want a more precise look at my professional journey? Just click on the button!
skillsIDoContent: Thanks to experiences in various areas, I was able to acquire complementary skills and expertise.
- Use of programming languages suited to the needs (Javascript, React, Sass, Tailwind, C#, etc.)
- Ability to visualize what the team needs and to accurately translate it.
- Building modular, component-driven, easily maintainable and scalable websites and applications
- Designing and prototyping websites and translating them to code (Figma, Photoshop, Adobe XD)
- Great level in writing in French as well as in English
skillsHireMeContent: Technical sills may be important, but human and relational skills are not the least also.
Various trainings and companies environments taught me essential skills for the best integration in a new team.
- Spirit of initiative in mastered fields
